settings.title: You May Be Interested also in

settings.item_text:
Packaging Products Ltd.’s CustomBox business is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the company (PPL). We are a Lower Hutt-based family-owned packaging wholesaler that has been in business since 1975. We provide a simple solution for small-run bespoke corrugated boxes.
CustomBox specialises in small volumes and offers a variety of packaging choices to match your needs with no set-up fees. Our response periods are typically 5-7 days, and we will provide the exact amount that you want!

settings.html_block:
Custom Cardboard Boxes

Custom Box is a division of the Packaging Products Group. We have been operating since 1975. Custom Box provides an easy solution for customers that require small to medium runs of custom made corrugated boxes. Our turnaround is usually 5-7 days and we will supply you the exact amount you require, with a free sample (if required).

Contact Us Design Your Own Box
